name: OCKOutcomeStore
desc: A store that performs read/write operations on an outcome data type.

items.name: func addOutcome(Self.Outcome, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<Self.Outcome>?)
items.desc: Adds an outcome asynchronously to the store.

items.name: func addOutcomes([Self.Outcome], callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[Self.Outcome]>?)
items.desc: Adds an array of outcomes asynchronously to the store.

items.name: func updateOutcome(Self.Outcome, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<Self.Outcome>?)
items.desc: Updates an outcome asynchronously in the store.

items.name: func updateOutcomes([Self.Outcome], callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[Self.Outcome]>?)
items.desc: Updates an array of outcomes asynchronously in the store.

items.name: func deleteOutcome(Self.Outcome, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<Self.Outcome>?)
items.desc: Deletes an outcome asynchronously from the store.

items.name: func deleteOutcomes([Self.Outcome], callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[Self.Outcome]>?)
items.desc: Deletes an array of outcomes asynchronously from the store.
